title: Summon Demon
data:
{{version028}} {{flavour|Opens a gate to the realm of Pandemonium and draws forth one of its inhabitants to serve the caster for a time. ---- “'Tis now the very witching time of night,
When churchyards yawn and hell itself breathes out
Contagion to this world.” :-William Shakespeare, _The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark_, III, 2."}} '''Summon Demon''' is a monster-only [[Summonings]] spell which summons a single [[common demon]] (tier-[[3]] or -[[4]]) to do the caster's bidding. Such demons are manageable individually, but the variety of possible summons can cause issues if you leave the summoner to their own devices. Certain demons may also be more problematic than others ([[chaos]]-[[brand]]ed attacks from [[chaos spawn]], [[Malmutate]] from [[neqoxec]]s, heavy [[cold]] damage from [[ice devil]]s, etc). As with any summoning spell, the best way to get rid of the summons is by killing the summoner (though [[Yara's Violent Unravelling]] will do in a pinch). {{monsters with spell}} ==History== {{Spell |name=Summon Demon |level=5 |school1={{Summonings}} |school2= |school3= |sources=
*[[Book of Summonings]]
|castingnoise=4 |spellnoise=0 |power cap=200 |range=Self |flags=Unholy, Selfench, Mons Abjure |summons limit=3 }} *Prior to [[0.27]], Summon Demon was castable by players. Demons summoned by this spell had a chance to spawn hostile. *Prior to [[0.14]] spell power didn't affect the chance to summon a stronger demon. [[Category:Monster spells]]
